text: 如果你們是還沒有看我房屋糾紛的影片的話
pinyin: rú guǒ nǐ men shì hái méi yǒu kàn wǒ fáng wū jiū fēn de yǐng piàn de huà
english: If you haven’t watched my video on housing disputes yet

text: 上一次呢我就被一個沒有良心的屋主騙訂金
pinyin: shàng yī cì ne wǒ jiù bèi yī gè méi yǒu liáng xīn de wū zhǔ piàn dìng jīn
english: Last time, I was defrauded of a deposit by an unscrupulous landlord.

text: 可是呢如果是住在馬來西亞自己的房子哦
pinyin: kě shì ne rú guǒ shì zhù zài mǎ lái xī yà zì jǐ de fáng zi ó
english: But what if you live in your own house in Malaysia?

text: 其實呢我從新加坡回到馬來西亞生活呢
pinyin: qí shí ne wǒ cóng xīn jiā pō huí dào mǎ lái xī yà shēng huó ne
english: Actually, I came back to live in Malaysia from Singapore.

text: 我要講的是我最後一次租的那間房間啦
pinyin: wǒ yào jiǎng de shì wǒ zuì hòu yī cì zū de nà jiān fáng jiān la
english: I'm going to talk about the last room I rented.

text: 他們都是允許我們在房間裡面吃東西的
pinyin: tā men dōu shì yǔn xǔ wǒ men zài fáng jiān lǐ miàn chī dōng xī de
english: They all allow us to eat in the room

text: 自己的屋子就絕對不會有這樣子的問題
pinyin: zì jǐ de wū zi jiù jué duì bù huì yǒu zhè yàng zi de wèn tí
english: Your own house will never have such a problem

text: 也就是我搬離新加坡租的那間房子哦
pinyin: yě jiù shì wǒ bān lí xīn jiā pō zū de nà jiān fáng zi ó
english: That's the house I rented when I moved out of Singapore.

text: 這是為了避免一些酸民在那邊耍嘴炮
pinyin: zhè shì wèi le bì miǎn yī xiē suān mín zài nà biān shuǎ zuǐ pào
english: This is to prevent some sarcastic people from talking nonsense over there.

text: 我們也會開下午一兩個小時這樣子啦
pinyin: wǒ men yě huì kāi xià wǔ yī liǎng gè xiǎo shí zhè yàng zi la
english: We will also open for an hour or two in the afternoon.

text: 但是呢在馬來西亞擁有自己屋子的人
pinyin: dàn shì ne zài mǎ lái xī yà yōng yǒu zì jǐ wū zi de rén
english: But what about people who own their own houses in Malaysia?

text: 而且在新加坡的電費呢算是蠻昂貴的
pinyin: ér qiě zài xīn jiā pō de diàn fèi ne suàn shì mán áng guì de
english: And the electricity bill in Singapore is quite expensive.

text: 沒有在新加坡生活過的馬來西亞觀眾
pinyin: méi yǒu zài xīn jiā pō shēng huó guò de mǎ lái xī yà guān zhòng
english: Malaysian viewers who have not lived in Singapore

text: 所以呢這個不可以一竹竿打翻整船人
pinyin: suǒ yǐ ne zhè gè bù kě yǐ yī zhú gān dǎ fān zhěng chuán rén
english: So you can't knock over the whole boat with one bamboo pole.

text: “住”馬來西亞跟“租”新加坡最大的不同哦
pinyin: “ zhù ” mǎ lái xī yà gēn “ zū ” xīn jiā pō zuì dà de bù tóng ó
english: The biggest difference between “living” in Malaysia and “renting” in Singapore

text: 只是我突發奇想，想要跟你們分享一下
pinyin: zhǐ shì wǒ tū fā qí xiǎng ， xiǎng yào gēn nǐ men fēn xiǎng yī xià
english: It's just a random idea that I wanted to share with you.

text: 我也沒有辦法一個一個的去回你們的PM
pinyin: wǒ yě méi yǒu bàn fǎ yī gè yī gè de qù huí nǐ men de PM
english: I can’t reply to your PMs one by one.

text: “租”新加坡跟“住”馬來西亞最大的不同啦
pinyin: “ zū ” xīn jiā pō gēn “ zhù ” mǎ lái xī yà zuì dà de bù tóng la
english: The biggest difference between "renting" in Singapore and "living" in Malaysia

text: 冷氣呢只可以開8個小時到12個小時不等
pinyin: lěng qì ne zhǐ kě yǐ kāi 8 gè xiǎo shí dào 12 gè xiǎo shí bù děng
english: The air conditioner can only be turned on for 8 to 12 hours.

text: 希望在看影片的你們會喜歡這支影片
pinyin: xī wàng zài kàn yǐng piàn de nǐ men huì xǐ huān zhè zhī yǐng piàn
english: I hope you guys who are watching the video will like this video

text: 現在想回去真的是覺得很好笑吶吶
pinyin: xiàn zài xiǎng huí qù zhēn de shì jué dé hěn hǎo xiào nà nà
english: It’s really funny that I want to go back now.

text: 隻呢這支影片是依據我個人的經驗
pinyin: zhī ne zhè zhī yǐng piàn shì yī jù wǒ gè rén de jīng yàn
english: But this video is based on my personal experience

text: 一個禮拜裡面哦只可以洗兩次衣服
pinyin: yī gè lǐ bài lǐ miàn ó zhǐ kě yǐ xǐ liǎng cì yī fú
english: You can only wash clothes twice a week.

text: 如果是有在新加坡租過房間的人呢
pinyin: rú guǒ shì yǒu zài xīn jiā pō zū guò fáng jiān de rén ne
english: What if you have rented a room in Singapore?

text: 可能馬來西亞的水費沒有那麼貴吧
pinyin: kě néng mǎ lái xī yà de shuǐ fèi méi yǒu nà me guì ba
english: Maybe the water bill in Malaysia is not that expensive?

text: 如果是往自己的家里安全去想的話
pinyin: rú guǒ shì wǎng zì jǐ de jiā lǐ ān quán qù xiǎng de huà
english: If you are thinking about the safety of your own home,

text: 要不然就是在外面吃了才回房間
pinyin: yào bù rán jiù shì zài wài miàn chī le cái huí fáng jiān
english: Otherwise, I would eat outside before going back to the room.

text: 這個屋主的做法呢是情有可原啦
pinyin: zhè gè wū zhǔ de zuò fǎ ne shì qíng yǒu kě yuán la
english: What this homeowner did is excusable.

text: 那麼現在呢就來跟你們分享一下
pinyin: nà me xiàn zài ne jiù lái gēn nǐ men fēn xiǎng yī xià
english: So now let me share it with you

text: 那其實就是我自己本身的狀況啦
pinyin: nà qí shí jiù shì wǒ zì jǐ běn shēn de zhuàng kuàng la
english: That's actually my own situation.
